mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM(SELECT max(a.auctionLogsId) id FROM auctionLogs AS a WHERE a.auctionUserId = #{auctionUserId} GROUP BY a.auctionGoodsId) a LEFT JOIN auctionLogs b ON a.id = b.auctionLogsId order by auctionTime desc
SELECT * FROM auctionLogs where auctionGoodsId=#{auctionGoodsId} order by auctionTime desc limit 5
SELECT * FROM auctionLogs where auctionGoodsId=#{auctionGoodsId} group by auctionUserId
select count(distinct(auctionUserId)) FROM auctionLogs where auctionGoodsId=#{auctionGoodsId}
select count(*) FROM auctionLogs where auctionGoodsId=#{auctionGoodsId}
select count(*) FROM auctionLogs where auctionGoodsId=#{auctionGoodsId} and auctionUserId=#{userId}
select b.* from (select max(auctionDiamond) auctionDiamond FROM auctionLogs where auctionGoodsId=#{auctionGoodsId})a left join auctionLogs b on a.auctionDiamond=b.auctionDiamond limit 1
